name: Dancing In The Rain
description:
Twirl your way through the streets as you race to dance tryouts! "Dancing in the Rain" is a top-down casual game, and play as a force guiding the ballerina safely onwards to dodge all sorts of big city obstacles as you hurry to make your big show in time!

 "Alice Mao" beautifully illustrated all of the art, "Harry Pepe IV" wrote a slow jazz piece and dipped it in a bucket of rain water, and “Kael(Can Delibas)” magically put everything together.

Controls:

Player movement: A, W, S, D or arrow keys

And clickable mischievous obstacles to avoid!
